infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Treasure Island Games uses your location to help you find treasure hunts nearby.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Treasure Island needs camera access to take your winner selfie for the Winner Card and upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Treasure Island needs access to your photos to set your profile picture and save your Winner Card.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Treasure Island needs permission to save your Winner Card to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Treasure Island uses the microphone for video content.

web.name: Treasure Island City Games
web.description: Find treasure hunts near you and win real prizes!

plugins.cameraPermission: Treasure Island needs camera access to take your winner selfie for the Winner Card.
plugins.microphonePermission: Treasure Island needs microphone access for video content.

plugins.photosPermission: HoodGames needs access to your photos to set your profile picture.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: HoodGames needs your location to show nearby treasure hunts.

plugins.photosPermission: Treasure Island needs access to your photos to save your Winner Card.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Treasure Island needs permission to save your Winner Card to your photo library.
